about-main.disease_body: It's a system that provides young sportsmen easily check their health and consult the doctor before the competitions.
about-main.purpose_body: Whenever a young sportsman needs to get a permission for the competition, he spends a lot of time for that. All features are made for observing and controlling the situation to be sure that everything goes in a good way.
about-main.suggest_body: We provide several features for observing sportsmen and stay connected with the personal doctor.

statistics.important_body_1: A lot of young sporstmen get injuries during trainings or competitions. That is why, it is very important to check your health before each of the competition!
statistics.important_body_2: Below you can see the percentage of injuries based on the kind of the sport.
